Pre-Game Insights: Without many of their major stars who have left to feature in the T20 League, the Proteas have a point or two to prove as the build-up to the T20 World Cup continues.
The visitors picked up an outstanding series win in the ODIs and now come into the T20s full of confidence.
Both teams look to win and start the series on a positive note.
The team batting first has won the last four T20I games played at this venue.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Johannesburg is expected to have clear and sunny weather during the match. The temperature will be around 27 degrees during the game.

The pitch at the Wanderers is expected to be a batting beauty. The track is generally quite hard and the ball comes onto the bat easily. Pace bowlers will struggle after the initial phase and spinners will have to be careful with their lines on this flat surface. The average first innings score in the last five T20I matches played here has been 179 runs.
